group_1.textCenter: ...Have you heard about Mitama? I see.@...Yeah.
Well, I've received some information on where@she was sighted before disappearing.
In Nishimachi, Daito Ward.@...Yes. Swindlers' Town...
I'm not familiar with the area, so I'd like to ask you@some things.
Do you think we could meet in person?

group_1.textLeft: This was such a surprise!
I never expected Yachiyo-san to call me, of all @people!

group_1.textRight: There's not many people I could ask to show me@around.
This "Swindlers' Town" place, though...
This might not be the best way to say it,@but it's quite unsettling.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah. Even people from Daito don't come here all @that often...

group_1.textRight: Hey, now.

group_1.textLeft: Those who mock a single cent shall soon cry over a @single cent! That's the Mao family motto.
...Wait, huh?

group_1.textRight: Mm?

group_1.textLeft: This is one of those coins from Mirrors.

group_1.textRight: You're right.
[chara:100201:effect_shake]Ack!
D'oh, sorry!

group_1.textLeft: C'mon, Mito, you can't get distracted while you're@walking.
You've gotta look where you're going...

group_1.textRight: Um, we're very sorry.

group_1.textLeft: You three...

group_1.textRight: Hey, it's Yachiyo-san!

group_1.textLeft: What are you doing here, of all places?

group_1.textRight: Oh, well, we were just picking these up while we@walked.

group_1.textLeft: .......[wait:1.0][chara:100201:motion_100][chara:100201:lipSynch_1]Mirrors coins?

group_1.textRight: Mito, that's not quite...
Um, we've been searching for Mitama-san.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!

group_1.textRight: It seems like she left her shop with a lot of coins@on hand...
And when we came here, we found a ton of those @coins lying on the ground.

group_1.textLeft: So we've been collecting them...

group_1.textRight: I guess we've followed the trail in a full circle by now.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...

group_1.textRight: Coins she took with her... a full circle?

group_1.textLeft: Does that bring anything in particular to mind?

group_1.textRight: This is just my best guess...
But there's a strong chance that Mitama put those@coins there for a reason.
Huh?!
So, um... @should we have left them alone, then...?

group_1.textLeft: I'm afraid that might be so.

group_1.textRight: Oh no... what now?!

group_1.textLeft: There's probably not enough time to put them all @back.
If she was forming a circle with them, that circle@was likely meant to surround something.
Can anyone tell us what would be in the center of it?
Allow me! I'll draw a map on the asphalt here...

group_1.textRight: Why not use our phones' maps instead?@They're portable and all.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:302001:effect_shake]Guh...!
To think I'd be reminded of our income gap here...

group_1.narration: Just as Ibuki-san's group said,@the coins had been arranged in a single circle...
As if to enclose a particular part of Swindlers' Town.
It almost seemed like a cage@to keep something trapped inside.
At the center was a single apartment building,@and an abandoned factory...

group_1.textLeft: ...?!@[wait:1.0][chara:101700:lipSynch_1]Yachiyo-san...?!

group_1.textRight: Mitama, thank goodness... you were here after all.

group_1.textLeft: I thought I was going to run out of magic and just wither away here...

group_1.textRight: Yes, you've consumed a terrible amount.

group_1.textLeft: I've been stuck here for sooo long...

group_1.textRight: Does anybody have any Grief Seeds on hand...?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah.

group_1.textRight: I've got one!

group_1.textLeft: Could we use it? We'll pay you back double later.

group_1.textRight: Oh, don't worry about it.
The Coordinator's done me more than enough@favors already!

group_1.textLeft: Thank you.
Phew...

group_1.textRight: What have you been doing here?

group_1.textLeft: Yachiyo-san...
